basics.name: David
basics.label: I'm a software engineer based in Barcelona. I'm currently working at NTT Data as a Frontend Developer.
basics.summary: Multimedia engineer with extensive practical experience in web and graphic design, 3D modelling, videogame developing on Unity and additional multimedia projects. Open to new computing environments and programming languages. I consider myself organised, punctual and a perfectionist who does not lack creativity. I look forward to new challenges which allow me to learn how to resolve situations more efficiently.

highlights: Migration of the design system for NAKA's administration portal.
Maintenance and evolution of the 'administration portal' for NAKA's product administration portal using React.
Creation and management of pipelines for the NAKA frontend solution: automated end-to-end tests, build optimization, etc.
Development of new features for the mobile app 'eCliente' for Allianz.
Conduct the 'Angular basics' course for Allianz workers.
Implementation of the XL insurance business with Angular 12, bug fixes and component refactorization (MAPFRE).
Migration of styles and functionalities for the Servihabitat portal with Liferay (Caixabank).
Creation of a calendar widget in a Liferay portlet (Educaixa/Caixabank).
Creation of different SPAs for RFP (Ready For Proportional) type websites with a high 'wow effect' in Angular 9 (SEAT and Orange).
Creation of a Design system using Storybooks and Stencil.
PoC: exporting design tokens with Figma towards a Design System.
Creation of building blocks (web components) with Angular 8 (Allianz).
Learning and creation of PoC for the Phygital department.
Development of VR applications with Unity for the USIX2.0 project, a training app for the industrial sector.
Web Development with Adobe Experience Manager for the CasaSeat Retail Car Configurator project (SEAT: CODE).
